version_description:
* View all your notifications in a new inbox, so you never miss a great deal.
* We made our product recommendations even more relevant, so you'll always be able to find an item you love.
* We love hearing about which items you like, so we made it easier to write reviews.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

* Coming soon - just spin and win! A fun way to win vouchers and discounts. Stay tuned for more information...
* See delivery fees, shipping options, and delivery times for all sellers of an item.
* New personalized product recommendations on the app home screen make it easy to find an item that's right for you.

* Coming soon - just spin and win! A fun way to win vouchers and discounts. Stay tuned for more information...
* See delivery fees, shipping options, and delivery times for all sellers of an item.
* New personalized product recommendations on the app home screen make it easy to find an item that's right for you.
Performance and stability improvements

* Custom order confirmation screens display more relevant information based on your payment method.
* Fixed an issue so that a product review email link takes you directly to the 'write review' screen.
* Now you can copy a product title by long pressing on it.
* We've updated how content is refreshed on the home and landing screens for a smoother shopping experience.

* Suggestions that automatically display when you search are more relevant and include product category options.
* Improved search results pages show more relevant results for searches with typos and offer alternate search suggestions.
* It's easier to see if you are viewing search results that are within a product category.
* Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements.

* Suggestions that automatically display when you search are more relevant and include product category options.
* Improved search results pages show more relevant results for searches with typos and offer alternate search suggestions.
* It's easier to see if you are viewing search results that are within a product category.
* Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements.

* New navigational tabs on product pages make it easier to browse product content and read reviews.
* Product reviews are easier to navigate and you can now read all reviews on one screen.
* Double tap an image in the image gallery to fully zoom in/out on details.
* Flash sales now display product titles so it is easier to see what is on offer.
New video streaming feature lets you watch live video of Lazada events and share your comments via Facebook.

* See which product reviews are the most useful based on the number of helpful ratings.
* Search within categories, brands, and more so that your search results only display the most relevant items.
* Filters dynamically update based on your choices to make it easier to refine searches.

* See which product reviews are the most useful based on the number of helpful ratings.
* Search within categories, brands, and more so that your search results only display the most relevant items.
* Filters dynamically update based on your choices to make it easier to refine searches.

* See which product reviews are the most useful based on the number of helpful ratings.
* Search within categories, brands, and more so that your search results only display the most relevant items.
* Filters dynamically update based on your choices to make it easier to refine searches.

* Got a question about a product? Now you can ask questions directly from the app or browse previous Q&A on the product information screen.
* We’ve made it easier to cancel an order. Visit the order detail screen and tap on the Cancel button.

5.8.1:

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

5.8:

* Got a question about a product? Now you can ask questions directly from the app or browse previous Q&A on the product information screen.
* We’ve made it easier to cancel an order. Visit the order detail screen and tap on the Cancel button.
Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.
Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.

* Search within a category from the product detail screen.
* Taobao Collection products are now available in Malaysia.
* Cancel LiveUp loyalty program membership from the My Orders screen (Singapore only).

* We streamlined our checkout process so it takes fewer steps to make a purchase.
* Want to pay by installments? Now you can see which products support this payment method on the product listing and detail pages.
* We have improved our product recommendations to suggest more relevant products to you.
* We decreased our app size so it takes up less space on your phone.

5.12.1
* Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.

5.12
* We streamlined our checkout process so it takes fewer steps to buy an item.
* Want to pay by installments? Now you can see which products support this payment method on the product listing and detail pages.
* We have improved our product recommendations to suggest more relevant products to you.
* We decreased our app size so it takes up less space on your phone.
Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.

Experience our newly designed landing page for mobile top-up which suggests you best suitable plans
We have fixed the bug related to notifications opt out. To ensure you don’t miss our specially customised deals, you can opt in by going to : Account -> Notifications -> Turn on “Notifications”.
Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.
Bug fixes and performance improvements for a more enjoyable shopping experience.

- Sharing reviews made more easy! Now you can write product and seller reviews for your previously purchased products on your dedicated Review screen
- We have improved shopping cart experience for combo products listing.

Brand new design of the Lazada app with new features including:
- Personalised recommendations of categories, products and brands, all tailored JUST FOR YOU 
- Flash sales with new offers frequently updated throughout the day
- Extensive and improved search filter and suggestion to quickly find what you’re looking for

Brand new design of the Lazada app with new features including:
- Personalised recommendations of categories, products and brands, all tailored JUST FOR YOU 
- Flash sales with new offers frequently updated throughout the day
- Extensive and improved search filter and suggestion to quickly find what you’re looking for
- New Product Listing page for convenient browsing and simpler voucher redemption
